org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse

Class InternalTemplateException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.TmplzException
            • org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse.AbstractParsingException
              • org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse.TemplateContentException
                • org.tmotte.tmplz.exception.parse.InternalTemplateException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class InternalTemplateException
extends TemplateContentException
    Thrown in various cases when the parser fails because of a bug. Occurences of this Exception should be reported to the author(s) so that they can fix the problem. Ideally, this Exception should never be thrown.
    See Also:
